articles.description: Quebec's provincial police force says the last of four suspects in a homicide last year has been arrested in Ontario.

articles.title: Weather tracker: Deep freeze grips Canada as US records warmest Christmas
articles.description: Temperatures plunge below -50C in the Yukon, while swaths of US experience springlike weatherNorthern Canada has been gripped by an intense and prolonged cold spell, with temperatures hovering between -20C and -40C for weeks. On Tuesday, Braeburn in the Yukon recorded -55.7C, its coldest December te

articles.title: Highway in B.C. reopens after atmospheric rivers washed out sections
articles.description: A portion of a British Columbia highway linking the Lower Mainland to Alberta that's been closed since atmospheric rivers washed away sections of the road earlier has reopened.

articles.description: Freezing rain and ice pellets could lead to power outages across Quebec.

articles.title: Hickey: Canadiens as a team need to shoot the puck more
articles.description: Too many Montreal players have a pass-first mentality, despite coach Martin St. Louis's pleas to fire more shots on net.
